purpose: Ask-Elena state-level real estate reference for Arizona (workflow norms, timelines, common issues, compliance-safe guidance). Not legal advice; defer to broker/attorney for legal interpretation.

general_character: Strong seasonal swings in some submarkets (snowbird influence in many areas).
Heat and sun exposure affect property condition more than many states.
New-build and HOA communities are common in many metros.

notes: Arizona commonly uses escrow/title for holding earnest money and coordinating closing steps.

typical_critical_milestones.name: Earnest money deposit
typical_critical_milestones.guidance: Confirm deadlines and receipt early; document proof of deposit.

typical_critical_milestones.name: Inspection window
typical_critical_milestones.guidance: Schedule inspections immediately; prioritize roof/HVAC/plumbing/electrical/pool where applicable.

typical_critical_milestones.name: Appraisal
typical_critical_milestones.guidance: Prep comps packet if the deal is tight; align expectations if price is aggressive.

typical_critical_milestones.name: Final walkthrough
typical_critical_milestones.guidance: Confirm repairs completed with receipts; verify utilities and property condition match contract terms.

common_concession_types: Repairs by licensed contractor with receipts
Home warranty (as a band-aid, not a fix)
preferred_negotiation_posture: Focus on health/safety + big-ticket first (roof, HVAC, plumbing, electrical, structural).
Offer options (repair vs credit vs price) to keep negotiations moving.
Keep messages short, factual, and calm to reduce emotional escalation.

climate_and_environment: Extreme heat impacts HVAC load, attic temps, roofing materials, and energy bills.
Sun exposure can accelerate exterior wear (paint, stucco cracking, window seals).
Monsoon-related drainage issues can appear: grading, washes, roof drainage, landscaping runoff.
property_systems: HVAC age/maintenance is a top-value factor; confirm service history if possible.
Roof condition and remaining life are high leverage; check for prior leaks/patching.
Pools/spas: equipment condition, leaks, safety barriers, and ongoing maintenance costs.
hoa_and_community: HOA docs can materially affect usage (rentals, exterior changes, parking, short-term rentals).
Confirm dues, special assessments, transfer fees, and any pending litigation if applicable.
title_and_permitting: Verify solar ownership vs leased agreements; confirm transfer requirements.
Watch for unpermitted additions/remodels; request documentation when visible.

buyer_agent_script.setup: We’re not trying to nickel-and-dime — we’re focusing on health/safety and big-ticket items that affect financing and long-term ownership.

comps_basics: Anchor comps within the closest reasonable radius and similar school/HOA boundaries when applicable.
Match bed/bath/sqft as tightly as possible; adjust cautiously for pools, lots, and condition.
Use days-on-market and recent pendings to gauge true demand.
pricing_and_comps_guidance.no_mls_disclaimer: Elena does not have MLS access; provide 2–3 comp anchors or the agent can paste summaries.

general_guidance: Use your broker-approved Arizona forms and state association templates.
Confirm local addenda commonly used in your area (HOA, solar, pool, well/septic if applicable).
earnest_money_posture: Clarify timing, holder, and proof of deposit early.
Document deadlines in a single transaction tracker to avoid preventable defaults.

disclosures_and_compliance_guardrails.disclaimer: Not legal advice. For legal interpretation, consult broker/attorney.
fair_housing_safe_language: Focus on property features and objective criteria (price, commute, property condition).
Avoid steering language about who a neighborhood is 'for' or value judgments like 'safe' or 'good schools'.
If asked about demographics or protected-class-adjacent topics, redirect to objective sources and let clients decide.
common_safe_redirects: I can share objective info like commute times, property features, and market stats — what matters most to you?
For school research, I recommend checking the district resources and third-party objective sites; I can help you compare commute and home features.
material_defects_high_level: When in doubt, disclose and document.
Keep it factual, dated, and aligned with your state forms.

buyer_follow_up_no_response.text: Quick ping — still want me to line up options for you this week, or should I pause for now?
buyer_follow_up_no_response.if_pause_response: No problem. Want me to circle back next week, or later this month?

offer_intro_to_listing_agent.script: Hey — I’m bringing you a clean offer. My buyer is motivated and we’re aiming for a smooth close. What matters most to your seller: price, timeline, or certainty?

seller_price_reality_check.script: Here’s the honest read: the market will tell us in the first 7 days. If we’re priced right, we’ll get strong traffic and at least one serious offer. If not, we adjust fast — not after we go stale.

daily_minimums: 1 status update to each client under contract (even if no change)
Update timeline/tasks same day after any event (showing, inspection, appraisal)
weekly_minimums: Review pipeline stage-by-stage; identify top 3 stuck deals and unblock them
Refresh comp sets for active listings and hot buyers
Audit deadlines for every file under contract
